thread.title: Democrats to Jeff Sessions: Recusal Is Not Enough
thread.title_full: Democrats to Jeff Sessions: Recusal Is Not Enough

author: Andrew Rafferty
title: Democrats to Jeff Sessions: Recusal Is Not Enough
text: (FILES) This file photo taken on January 10, 2017 shows Sen. Jeff Sessions, R-AL, as he testifies during his confirmation hearing to be Attorney General of the US before the Senate Judiciary Committee in Washington, DC. US Attorney General Jeff Sessions said March 2, 2017he will recuse himself "whenever it's appropriate" from Justice Department probes into alleged ties between Donald Trump's campaign and the Russian government, after coming under fire himself for contacts with Moscow. Sessions met twice with Russia's ambassador to Washington last year, the White House confirmed, while he was serving as both a senator and a top foreign policy adviser to Trump's campaign. / AFP PHOTO / MOLLY RILEYMOLLY RILEY/AFP/Getty Images
